channel.title: Homes on Yunduan Cui
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Yunduan Cui

item.description: News I will move to Center for Automotive Electronics, Shenzhen Institutes of Advanced Technology, Chinese Academy of Sciences from April, 2020 as a research Associate Professor. Biography Download complete CV Experience 2017 Oct - 2019 MarResearch Assistant ProfessorIntelligent System Control Laboratory,Nara Institute of Science and Technology, Japan. 2015 Apr - 2017 SepResearch AssistantIntelligent System Control Laboratory,Nara Institute of Science and Technology, Japan. 2017 MarVisiting ScholarCentre for Autonomous Systems,University of Technology, Sydney, Australia.

item.title: Publication
item.description: Under Review Yunduan Cui, Osaki Shigeki, and Takamitsu Matsubara. “Autonomous Boat Driving System using Sample-efficient Model Predictive Control-based Reinforcement Learning Approach.” Journal of Field Robotics Journal Lingwei Zhu, Yunduan Cui, Go Takami, Hiroaki Kanokogi, and Takamitsu Matsubara. “Scalable Reinforcement Learning for Plant-wide Control of Vinyl Acetate Monomer Process.” Control Engineering Practice. link James Poon, Yunduan Cui, Jaime Valls Miro, and Takamitsu Matsubara. “Learning from demonstration for locally assistive mobility aids.
